ygData.subject: Re: Concurrent Jobs?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was running Heritrix 1.12.0 on my Fedora Core 6. I rebuilt the Java RPM with Sun JVM 1.5.11-x86_64 and JPackage. Unfortunately, I didn t save the stack trace
